title: WHEN YOU HURT ALL OVER with Katy Bowman, M.S.
description: When you hurt all over, moving hurts, but your doctor tells you that you need to exercise. Biomechanist Katy Bowman has selected a handful of gentle stretching exercises that will improve the flow of blood and lymph even to the extremities, reducing internal pressures, raising immunity, and improving muscle strength.
